Class MovieGoerModule

  • Object
    • MovieGoerModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginInterface, ModuleInterface
    public class MovieGoerModule
extends Object
implements ModuleInterface, LoginInterface
    Represents the module for MovieGoer functions.
    Since:
    2022-11-11
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ivan Loke

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ArrayList<Movie> allMovies
      List of all Movies in the database.
      private boolean isLoggedIn
      Stores whether the MovieGoer is currently logged in.
      private ArrayList<MovieGoer> movieGoerList
      List of all MovieGoers in the database.
      private MovieGoer movieGoerObj
      Stores the instance of a MovieGoer object who is currently logged in.
      private Scanner sc
      Scanner to query users for inputs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void addMovieReview()
      Method allows user to add a Reivew object to a Movie Object which they had previously bought tickets for.
      void login()
      Prompts the user to login as MovieGoer.
      private void printMovieListByRating()
      Method prints top 5 Movies which are NOW_SHOWING based on Review ratings.
      private void printMovieListBySales()
      Method prints top 5 Movies which are NOW_SHOWING based on ticket sales.

      Prints Movie title and description matching input phrase.
      void run()
      Runs the MovieGoerModule.

      • MovieGoerModule

        public MovieGoerModule​(Scanner sc,
                       boolean isGuest)
        Creates a new MovieGoerModule for MovieGoer functionality.
        Parameters:
        sc - Scanner to query for user's inputs.
        isGuest - boolean on whether to initialise the MovieGoerModule with guest account.

      • printMoviesSearch

        private void printMoviesSearch​(String phrase,
                               boolean detailed)
        Prints Movie title and description matching input phrase.
        Parameters:
        phrase - all movies in database will be checked if it contains this string in its title.
        detailed - represnts if other Movie details, apart from title, will be printed.

      • printMovieListByRating
